title: K-Beauty Brand Launches Eco-Friendly Bio-Based Cushion Compact | Beauty Packaging
text:
'WakeMake,' a brand by Korean retailer Olive Young, launched a compact made from PHA and PLA—and an eco-friendly alternative to ABS. Cookies help us to provide you with an excellent service.
